text: Dith Pran (; September 27, 1942 â€“ March 30, 2008) was a Cambodian photojournalist. He was best known as a refugee and survivor of the Cambodian genocide. ==Death== Pran died on March 30, 2008 in New Brunswick, New Jersey from pancreatic cancer, aged 65. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Photojournalists Category:Cambodian people Category:War correspondents Category:Cambodian genocide Category:Cancer deaths in New Jersey Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer
title: Dith Pran
